response:
Urgent neuro-imaging is required to differentiate between inflammatory (enhancement) and compressive causes. Serological testing is critical to distinguish between typical demyelination and antibody-mediated diseases (NMO/MOG) which carry a higher risk of relapse and require different management. Vascular and infectious screens are necessary to rule out mimics.
